spec_data.Name: perl-Gtk2-Ex-Dialogs
spec_data.Description:
This module provides a clean, simple, quick API to generate and use common
Gtk2 dialogs, either from within a full-blown Gtk2 application or as a one-off
deal inside a non-Gtk2 perl application.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 12:00:36 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Useful tools for GNOME2/GTK2 Perl GUI design
